title: can someone make it so i can post here? says i'm not 30
body:
this account has a rank from last year, and is over a year old

yet it says i have to be 15 or higher to post...can someone please fix this for me?

replies.body: The boards can take a moment to sync up your account.  It does look like you're showing up as 30 now.  Let me know if you still have any issues posting!
